name: UWidgetSwitcher
doc: A widget switcher is like a tab control, but without tabs. At most one widget is visible at time.

methods.name: GetActiveWidget
methods.doc: Get the reference of the currently active widget

methods.name: GetActiveWidgetIndex
methods.doc: Gets the slot index of the currently active widget

methods.name: GetNumWidgets
methods.doc: Gets the number of widgets that this switcher manages.

methods.name: GetWidgetAtIndex
methods.doc: Get a widget at the provided index

methods.name: SetActiveWidget
methods.doc: Activates the widget and makes it the active index.

methods.name: SetActiveWidgetIndex
methods.doc: Activates the widget at the specified index.
